A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Say it with the family and we all agreed that it is long\, one of the better recent Star Wars but we were kinda hoping for the dark side to win to put an end to the entire star wars saga.  I think they are trying to reboot with new characters but those new characters do not match the original.  Hope this is the last Star Wars but if they do another one I will probably see it just out of curiosity.
